duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage healthcare products from design to deployment and implementation support efforts.
Lead and oversee the development and maintenance of modern applications with cloud native architecture.
Provide top-down oversight to ensure successful delivery in adherence to stakeholder goals.
Lead a team of Scrum Masters/Managers, addressing questions and challenges regarding projects.
Manage the performance of the delivery team and assign/oversee daily tasks of technical personnel.
Ensure adherence to processes and timely implementation of product vision.
Manage production technologies and maintenance, as well as develop comprehensive project/product plans.
Maintain the required documentation for knowledge management and define clear deliverables and responsibilities for staff members.
Participate with diverse teams, manage internal staff, and hire/mentor/evaluate personnel.
Execute all aspects of large construction projects and manage project schedules and resources.
Prepare project status reports for senior management and document all phases of the project.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT or related field (Master's preferred)
